FlowOrchestrationStepInstance.name: FlowOrchestrationStepInstance
FlowOrchestrationStepInstance.description: Represents a run-time instance of a step in a run-time instance of a stage of a run-time instance of an orchestration.

Name.description: The API name of the step.

OrchestrationInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowOrchestrationInstance associated with the orchestration step instance.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the automated process user. This field is available in API version 56.0 and later.

StageInstanceId.description: The ID of the FlowOrchestrationStageInstance associated with the orchestration step instance.

Status.description: The status of the orchestration step instance. Valid values are: Completed—The step instance completed. Discontinued—The step instance was in progress or completed when it’s associated stage instance completed, or the step was in progress or completed when the orchestration instance encountered an error. Error—The step instance encountered an error or the autolaunched flow associated with a step instance encountered an error. InProgress—The step instance is running, the step instance was in progress when its associated stage encountered an error, or the screen flow associated with the step instance encountered an error. NotStarted—The step instance was created, but hasn’t met its entry condition.

StepType.description: The type of step. Valid values are: InteractiveStep—Interactive Step BackgroundStep—Background Step AynchronousBackgroundStep—Asynchronous Background StepThis value is available in API version 54.0 and later.
